pour:
(:action pour_vinegar_into_container
    :parameters (?v - vinegar ?c - container)
    :precondition (and (location ?v bottle) (location ?c cabinet))
    :effect (and (location ?v container) (location ?c countertop))
)

(:action dip_wicks_in_vinegar
    :parameters (?w - wick ?v - vinegar ?c - container)
    :precondition (and (orientation ?w removed) (composition ?w dry) (location ?v container))
    :effect (and (composition ?w wet) (location ?v in_wick))
)
remove:
(:action remove_wick
    :parameters (?w - wick ?l - lamp ?s - stove)
    :precondition (and (or (orientation ?w on_lamp) (orientation ?w on_stove)))
    :effect (and (orientation ?w removed) (composition ?w dry))
)
make:
(:action make_wicks_dry
    :parameters (?w - wick)
    :precondition (and (composition ?w wet))
    :effect (and (composition ?w dry))
)

These actions should capture the necessary steps to prevent a wick lamp or stove from smoking by treating the wicks with vinegar and ensuring they are dry before use.
